title: My UI freezes when I try to delete apps from my homescreen - Drag to delete icon then freezes...
content:
When I make a 1800 call and have use the numeric pad it freezes and can't input any data.

When I try to delete an app from my homescreen - I drag the icon to the delete function then it prompts me to confirm the delete action but the UI freezes.  

Anyone got any solutions? It sometimes works in landscape mode?  but very unpredictable and erratic? 

Have rebooted, tried in safe mode, nothing seems to work
